data.text:
Through the our 29 years as a company, Southern Entertainment has cultivated a true ensemble of talented professionals, allowing us to offer the full spectrum of services every successful event requires. Further, not only does Southern Entertainment have the skills required, but the collective years of expertise to successfully navigate the unpredictable elements of live and outdoor events. When it comes to deciding on who you should partner with, we know our team stands a league above the rest. For more information on the specific services we provide, please see the outlined descriptions below. Of course, if you have any questions about how Southern Entertainment can assist, regardless of what stage in planning you’ve reached, please reach out and contact us today.

Site Acquisition

When it comes to providing our clients with the perfect event venue, Southern Entertainment doesn’t just stop at identifying available space. We take a proactive approach, ensuring that the venue is not only well-equipped to accommodate your attendees but also that the surrounding infrastructure guarantees a seamless entry and exit. Our team’s expertise in site selection and negotiations forms the very cornerstone upon which the success of your event is founded.

Full-Service Event Marketing & Promotion

At Southern Entertainment, we understand that effective event marketing and promotion are not just important; they are absolutely vital for the success of your event. We create tailored marketing strategies that go beyond the basics, generating excitement, generating interest, and drawing your target audience to your event. Our strong event identity, media partnerships, and innovative promotions serve as the driving forces behind a truly successful event, captivating the hearts and minds of your audience.

Sponsorship & Corporate Partnerships

With Southern Entertainment, securing corporate sponsors is about more than just funding; it’s about infusing your event with essential resources that elevate its quality and reach. Our expert team excels at building strategic partnerships, ensuring that your event gains not only financial support but also the valuable brand exposure that can make your vision truly shine.

Event Production

In the world of Southern Entertainment, event production doesn’t just add an extra layer of excitement; it weaves the very fabric of your event’s identity. Our seasoned production team aligns the visual and auditory aspects with your brand, audience, and overall experience. We leave a lasting and indelible impression on every single attendee through creative planning and execution.

Talent

When it comes to booking and managing talent, we don’t just see it as essential; it’s the heartbeat of any entertainment event at Southern Entertainment. Our talent experts curate and manage the artists, creating the magic that keeps attendees not just engaged but enraptured. We ensure they not only return for more but carry the memory of your event with them.

Human Resources & Risk Management

Proper human resources and risk management at Southern Entertainment aren’t merely vital; they are the guardians of event security and success. Our dedicated team ensures that the right staff is in place to manage the event and that safety measures are poised to address any unexpected situations, ensuring every attendee’s well-being.

Food & Beverage Concessions

At Southern Entertainment, food and beverage concessions are not just pivotal; they are a source of delight for your attendees. We oversee all aspects, offering a diverse range of high-quality dining options. Our focus on retail, production catering, and VIP catering ensures that attendees not only have a satisfying and enjoyable time during the event but carry with them a memorable gastronomic experience.
